import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { MyContext } from "../context"; import { Flex } from '@chakra-ui/core'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; const NavBar = (props) => { const context = useContext(MyContext) const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); const btnRef = React.useRef(); const logout = () => { context .handleLogout() .then() .catch() } return ( {context => { BSafe Home
